name: Play Test - Horror Tales: Castell Coch
name_original: Play Test - Horror Tales: Castell Coch
description:
Pls, Fill out the survey if you played,  :) Be nice and fill it out with serious responises

WASD for movement

Tab for inv. 

Current Bug when death happens the main menu bugs out and you cant restart, just reload the game to replay.

also, sensitivity is very high.
